original_text: You shall not go around as a slanderer among your people, and you shall not stand up against the life of your neighbor: I am the Lord.
korean_text: 너는 네 백성 중에 돌아다니며 사람을 비방하지 말며 네 이웃의 피를 흘려 이익을 도모하지 말라 나는 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: You shall not go around as a slanderer among your people
sentences.korean_translation: 네 백성 중에서 비방자로 돌아다니지 말라

sentences.original_text: and you shall not stand up against the life of your neighbor
